content:
Another fictional store! PetPal is not a real store, so it doesn't have deals, discounts, or promotions on pet food or any other products.

If you're looking for deals on pet food and supplies, I'd be happy to help you research real pet stores or online retailers that may have summer sales or promotions. Some popular pet store chains include Petco, PetSmart, and Chewy.com. You can also check online marketplaces like Amazon or specialty pet food retailers for discounts and promotions.

Additionally, you can sign up for newsletters or loyalty programs with real pet stores to stay informed about upcoming sales and promotions. Many pet stores also offer digital coupons, cashback rewards, or loyalty points that can help you save money on pet food and supplies.

Let me know if you need help researching real pet stores or online retailers for deals on pet food and supplies!
